type.name: TupleChain
type.summary:
Converts results into a reusable tuple with warmup periods removed and nulls converted to NaN.
See documentation for more information.
type.returns: Collection of non-nullable tuple time series of results, without null warmup periods.

type.name: Prune
type.summary:
Removes the recommended quantity of results from the beginning of the results list using a reverse-engineering approach.
See documentation for more information.

type.name: Condense
type.summary:
Removes non-essential records containing null values with unique consideration for this indicator.
See documentation for more information.
type.returns: Time series of indicator results, condensed.

type.name: CondenseT
type.summary:
Removes non-essential records containing null or NaN values.
See documentation for more information.
type.returns: Time series of indicator results, condensed.

type.name: SyncSeries
type.summary:
Forces a date series collection to have the same date-based records as another matched baseline.
This utility is undocumented.
type.typeparam: Any series type to be transformed.
Any series type to be matched.
type.param: The series to compare for matching.
Synchronization behavior See options in SyncType enum.
type.returns: Original date-based series, synchronized to a comparator match.
